plot: Eric is scolding at Margo during a fitting with some models. Later, he apologizes and explains that he is concerned about a friend with cancer. Kristen asks Stephanie for advice about Clarke, but Stephanie has none. Brooke tells Eric that Beth is out of surgery and he is relieved. Kristen convinces Eric to put her and Clarke's designs into production. Still unsure whether Liz Henderson is now living under the name Beth Logan, Stephanie goes to the hospital where Beth's room is currently empty. Stephanie looks around a bit and finds Beth's bible and the flowers Eric sent Beth.—Torsten B. Tomaschek
